title: Cordon
meaning: Line of soldiers or police blocking people from entering or exiting an area / separate off
examples: There was a police cordon around the site of the incident
There was a cordon of police on either side of the road as the prince drove down the road
the area was cordoned off because they didn't want the criminals to escape
